package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache.memcached;
 
 
/** * This is a {@link KeyHashingScheme} decorator that simply adds * a known prefix to the results of another {@code KeyHashingScheme}. * Primarily useful for namespacing a shared memcached cluster, for * example. */
/*...*/

/** * Creates a new {@link KeyHashingScheme} that prepends the given * prefix to the results of hashes from the given backing scheme. * Users should be aware that memcached has a fixed maximum key * length, so the combination of this prefix plus the results of * the backing hashing scheme must still fit within these limits. * @param prefix * @param backingScheme */
